anuradhapura,padawiya,polonnarawa,shri pura saha mahawalijanapada aashrithawa sigrayen pathira yana wakugadu rogayen danata dukwidina pirisa 15000k ikmawana athara owungen 8000k sadaha kadinam prathikara himiwiya yuthuwa thibe.mema roga sadaha danata kolambaa jathika rohale pamanak prathikara sidukaranu labana athara emagin wasarakata sidukaranu labana wakugadu baddha kirim ganana 100k pamana wana athara 8000k pamana rogi sankhyawakata meya kisiseth nosahe.
